name: Acid - 20 Connecticut - Toro
additionalNotes: Drew Estate announced that it would be expanding its ACID 20 brand with a new version, the ACID 20 Connecticut. Both cigars use the same blend on paper: an Ecuadorian Connecticut wrapper over an Indonesian binder and fillers from Nicaragua. A representative from Drew Estate did not respond to multiple messages seeking clarification about whether these two cigars are the same blend in function, or just on paper. For what it’s worth, the original ACID 20 blend uses a Mexican San Andrés wrapper over an Indonesian binder and Nicaraguan fillers.
